description: Led frontend architecture for Mastercard Academy, developing scalable, accessible Web Components with Lit, overseeing end-to-end development, and aligning technical solutions with business goals.

Led UI/UX development for Mastercard Academy, boosting engagement through performance optimization, Design Tokens, TypeScript best practices, and driving user-centric features aligned with company-wide frontend standards.
Assisted developers with API integrations for eCommerce payments, optimizing transaction workflows with XML/JSON and streamlining Agile processes through Jira support and Scrum collaboration.

Utilized web development expertise in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS to enhance advertiser experience, improving returns through optimized frontend performance, Tag Management, and efficient data reporting solutions.

Delivered custom web designs with Figma, Photoshop, and Illustrator, boosting client satisfaction and traffic; developed UX-focused web solutions and led branding collaborations driving sustained business growth.
